duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct sports injury evaluations and develop treatment plans for athletes.
Provide rehabilitation techniques and oversee athletes' recovery process.
Perform athlete assessments and provide exercise prescriptions for individual needs.
Document medical records and maintain accurate reports of athlete progress.
Utilize first aid and CPR in emergency situations to ensure athlete safety.
Demonstrate strong interpersonal and communication skills when working with athletes and coaching staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Athletic Training or related field (Master's preferred)
